title: Adidas PROTOUR OFFWHITE Racket Bag 3.4
description:
Features and Benefits

  • Large Central Compartment:
    Spacious and easily accessible, this zippered compartment is perfect for storing clothing, towels, and other essentials.

  • Thermal-Insulated Side Pockets:
    Two dedicated side pockets with thermal lining ensure your rackets are protected from extreme temperatures, preserving their performance and longevity.

  • Ventilated Bottom Compartment:
    Designed with a breathable mesh, the bottom section is ideal for storing shoes, keeping them separate from other items while preventing odor buildup.

  • Top Pocket for Personal Items:
    A convenient, small pocket located at the top of the bag provides quick access to personal belongings like keys, wallets, or mobile devices.

title: Adidas MULTIGAME BLACK/RED Backpack 3.4
description:
The perfect everyday backpack, designed with a main compartment with adjustable volume thanks to its innovative ‘Rolltop’ opening. Inside, you'll find a special pocket for delicate items and a divider ideal for your computer or racquet. In addition, there are two elastic mesh side pockets to carry your water bottles and two padded compartments: a front one with thermal insulation and a back one to protect your laptop safely. Its reinforced bottom ensures exceptional durability, while the adjustable padded mesh straps and back panel ensure comfortable carrying. Complete your style with Ale Galán's new signature hang tag.

 

 Materials: Polyethersulphone/ recycled polyester

 Capacity: 42-48 L

 Dimensions: 29 x 15,5 x 47 cm

 Color: Black/Light grey/ Red/Metallic silver

 Accessory Type: Backpack

 Collection: 2025

title: Adidas MULTIGAME SAND Racket Bag 3.4
description:
Key Features

  • Flap-Shaped Main Opening Design:
    An innovative main compartment layout ensures effortless packing and access to all your essentials.

  • Thermal-Insulated Side Pockets:
    Two side compartments with thermal lining safeguard your rackets from temperature variations, keeping them in top condition.

  • Convenient Top Zipper Pocket:
    Perfect for storing smaller personal items like keys, wallets, or other essentials within easy reach.

  • Ventilated Shoe Compartment:
    A bottom section with mesh ventilation keeps your shoes separate and fresh, maintaining overall bag hygiene.

  • Additional Narrow Side Pockets:
    Two slim side pockets offer extra space for smaller gear and accessories.

  • Exclusive Pro Player Signature Hangtag:
    Celebrate excellence with a premium hangtag inspired by top professional players, adding a touch of style and prestige to your gear.

Designed for athletes who demand functionality and elegance, this bag offers unmatched organization, protection, and a nod to the sport's elite.

title: Adidas TOUR BLACK Racket Bag 3.4
description:
Key Features

  • Spacious Central Compartment:
    A large main section to store all your essential gear with ease and convenience.

  • Thermal-Insulated Side Pockets:
    Two side compartments designed to keep your rackets protected from temperature fluctuations, ensuring peak performance.

  • Ventilated Shoe Compartment:
    A bottom section with mesh ventilation keeps your shoes separate and fresh, enhancing hygiene and organization.

  • Compact Top Pocket:
    A small, easily accessible pocket at the top is perfect for storing personal items like keys, wallets, or other small essentials.

This thoughtfully designed bag combines functionality and durability, making it the ideal companion for players who value performance and practicality.

title: Adidas Multigame Black 3.3 2024 Padel Bag
description:
The Adidas Multigame Black 3.3 2024 Padel Bag is an ideal choice for padel players seeking a practical and secure means of transporting their gear. Featuring a sleek, functional design, this bag ensures you can carry all your essentials for the game, including rackets, shoes, and small accessories.

This bag is built for strength and longevity. It features a large central compartment with a zipper, perfect for storing clothes, towels, and other personal items. The two side compartments are designed specifically for paddles and include thermal insulation to protect them from temperature fluctuations.

Beneath the central compartment, there's a mesh area designed for shoe storage, which keeps them ventilated and prevents moisture accumulation. Additionally, the bag includes three pockets—one on each side and another on the top—making it easy to access and organize your smaller items.

title: Adidas Multigame Grey 3.3 2024 Padel Bag
description:
Adidas Multigame Grey 3.3 2024 padel racket bag with a large central pocket. On both sides it incorporates a thermally insulated pocket for rackets. Beneath the central compartment there is a space with a ventilation mesh designed for shoes. For small items, the bag has three pockets, one on each side and a third on the top.

 56x35x29cm

title: Adidas MULTIGAME BLACK/RED Racket Bag 3.4
description:
Key Features

  • Innovative Flap-Shaped Main Opening:
    A newly designed main compartment offers enhanced accessibility and convenience, making it easier to pack and retrieve your gear.

  • Thermal-Insulated Side Pockets:
    Dedicated side compartments with thermal lining protect your rackets from extreme temperatures, ensuring optimal performance.

  • Top Zipper Pocket:
    A strategically placed top pocket provides quick access to smaller essentials like keys, wallets, or mobile devices.

  • Ventilated Bottom Compartment:
    Equipped with breathable mesh, the bottom section is perfect for storing shoes, keeping them separate from your other items and maintaining freshness.

  • Slim Side Pockets:
    Two narrow side pockets add extra storage options for accessories or smaller gear.

  • Exclusive Pro Player Hangtag:
    A premium signature hangtag adds a touch of exclusivity and recognition, celebrating the game's top players.

This upgraded bag combines functionality, innovation, and style, catering to the needs of serious players who demand the best in design and performance.

title: Nox Pro Series Black Padel Bag
description:
Nox Pro Series Blue Padel Bag with its functional design, you can easily transport your padel rackets, sportswear and accessories without compromising on space. The spacious main compartment allows you to organise your equipment efficiently, keeping it protected and ready for use.

The NOX PADEL Pro Series padel bags and backpacks are made of high quality materials that guarantee durability and resistance. Their sleek black design adds a touch of sophistication and style.

Features:
- Made of innovative and high quality materials that improve endurance reducing weight.
- Nox Thermo Tech compartment with side opening designed to protect your rackets against extreme weather.
- Main compartment designed for 3 rackets and accessories.
- You can use it as backpack removing handles.
- Special ventilated compartment for shoes.
- Different pockets to store your personal belongings.
- Includes laundry bag for sweaty clothes.
- Ergonomic padded straps for easier transport and air circulation.

Specifications:
- Measures: 65.5 x 30 x 35 cm.

title: Nox Luxury MASTER Series Padel Bag
description:
LUXURY MASTER Padel Racket Bag
The LUXURY MASTER padel racket bag offers the perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability, designed with premium textiles and advanced technical materials to minimize weight and maximize resistance. Available in sleek black/white, this bag is ideal for players who seek both elegance and practicality on and off the court.

Key Features:

  • Main Compartment: Spacious side-opening compartment with capacity for up to 3 padel rackets, clothing, and essentials.
  • Thermal Compartment: Featuring NOX ThermoTech technology, this insulated space protects 2 padel rackets, water bottles, and temperature-sensitive items from heat.
  • Side Compartment #1: Rigid external structure for added protection of valuable items.
  • Side Compartment #2: Organized with multiple pockets for accessories, phone, wallet, keys, and other personal belongings.
  • Ventilated Shoe Compartment: Dedicated, ventilated space to keep shoes fresh and avoid unwanted odors.
  • Back Pocket: Convenient for additional storage.
  • Backpack Functionality: Convertible design allows you to remove the straps for greater comfort and versatility.
  • Ergonomic Main Handle: Comfortable grip with a sturdy base, providing added protection against bumps and uneven surfaces.

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 600 x 300 x 350 mm
  • Capacity: 60 liters

Upgrade your padel experience with the LUXURY MASTER bag, where performance meets elegance.

title: Nox PRO SERIES Black Backpack
description:
Key features:

Number of main compartments: 2;
Separate shoe compartment;
Dimensions: 45 x 30 x 23 cm;
Capacity: 28 liters.

The Nox Pro Series Backpack is from Nox's bag collection. This versatile backpack is ideal for players who are looking for a comfortable and compact backpack.The bag features 2 main compartments with space for rackets and clothing. The smaller side pockets are ideal for storing accessories. In addition, the bag has a separate shoe compartment at the bottom. Thanks to the padded shoulder straps, the bag is comfortable to carry on the back.

title: Nox Pro Series White Padel Bag
description:
Nox Pro Series White Padel Bag with its functional design, you can easily transport your padel rackets, sportswear and accessories without compromising on space. The spacious main compartment allows you to organise your equipment efficiently, keeping it protected and ready for use.

The NOX PADEL Pro Series padel bags and backpacks are made of high quality materials that guarantee durability and resistance. Their sleek navy blue design adds a touch of sophistication and style.

Details:

  • Capacity for up to 2 padel rackets.
  • Thermal compartment (Nox TermoTech technology) to protect your padel rackets from the heat.
  • Double zippered main compartment for easy access to the interior.

  • Easy access top compartment for mobile phone, keys, wallet...

title: Nox PRO SERIES White Backpack
description:
Crafted from high-quality materials with a thoughtful design, this backpack offers the perfect balance of practicality and elegance. Its spacious, well-organized structure ensures you can carry everything you need—from your laptop and books to your complete padel gear, including racket, shoes, clothing, and accessories.

Key Features:

  • Main Compartment #1: Padded lining for maximum protection, ideal for a racket or laptop.

  • Main Compartment #2: Ample space for a racket, apparel, and accessories.

  • Independent Shoe Compartment: Side entry with ventilation system to keep gear fresh.

  • Front Pocket: Secure storage for keys, wallet, club card, and small essentials.

  • Side Mesh Pocket: Perfect for a ball canister or water bottle.

  • Comfortable Carrying: Padded straps and back panel for superior comfort.

  • Ergonomic Design: Optimized grip and air circulation for a lightweight, breathable feel.

With its versatile design, this backpack keeps all your essentials at your fingertips—whether for daily use, training, or matches. Elevate your game with style and convenience.

title: Nox LUXURY OPEN Series Black/Red Padel Bag
description:
Introducing the New LUXURY Padel Bag Collection
Crafted with premium textiles and cutting-edge technical materials, the new LUXURY padel bag combines durability, lightweight design, and sleek style. Available in a striking black/red color, this bag is designed to meet the needs of padel players who demand both functionality and elegance.

Key Features:

  • Spacious Main Compartment: Side-opening design with room for up to 3 padel rackets, clothing, and other essentials.
  • Thermal Compartment: Incorporates NOX ThermoTech technology, with space for 2 padel rackets, bottles, and other temperature-sensitive items, providing protection from heat.
  • Organized Side Compartments: Distributed pockets for easy access to accessories like your cell phone, wallet, and keys.
  • Ventilated Shoe Compartment: Keeps shoes separated, ventilated, and odor-free.
  • Back Pocket: Provides additional storage space for personal items.
  • Versatile Backpack Function: Removable handles for added comfort and versatility, allowing you to wear it as a backpack.
  • Ergonomic Main Handle & Rigid Base: Designed for comfort and reinforced to protect against bumps and rough surfaces.

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 600 x 300 x 350 mm
  • Capacity: 60 liters

Stylish, practical, and built to last—the LUXURY padel bag is perfect for players who want to travel to the court in style and convenience.

title: Nox Luxury Master Series Backpack
description:
The Nox Luxury Master Backpack is NOX’s premium padel backpack, crafted with next-generation textiles and technical materials to reduce weight, increase durability, and provide ultimate comfort.

Blending style and functionality, this sport-casual backpack is perfect for both everyday use and padel training. With its sleek black-and-white design, it offers the ideal combination of elegance and performance.

Key Features:

  • Main Compartment #1: Designed for a padel racket or laptop, with a rigid outer shell for maximum protection.

  • Main Compartment #2: Spacious enough for 2 padel rackets, apparel, ball cans, and accessories.

  • Dedicated Shoe Compartment: Front section with ventilation system for breathability.

  • Organized Storage: Front compartments for phone, wallet, glasses, etc., plus side pockets for keys, cards, and bottles.

  • Superior Comfort: Ergonomic padded straps and breathable back panel for optimal airflow and support.

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 500 x 330 x 200 mm

  • Capacity: 30 L

title: Siux Trilogy SS24 Padel Bag
description:
Siux Trilogy Racket Bag – Durable and Spacious

The Siux Trilogy Racket Bag comes in green and black with a rigid side structure for extra protection against impacts. It features a large central compartment for multiple rackets, two zippered side compartments for additional gear, and a top pocket for small personal items.

Designed for comfort, it includes padded back support and handles, allowing you to carry it easily as a backpack. A durable and spacious choice for any padel player.

title: Siux The King Bag Black
description:
Siux The King Black Sports Bag – Premium Elegance & Functionality

The Siux The King Black is a premium sports bag that blends sleek style, durability, and versatility. Crafted from high-quality PU leather, it stands out for its resistance and refined finish, making it the ideal choice for training sessions, competitions, or travel. As part of the Siux Premium Series, this bag is designed for athletes who demand both performance and sophistication.

Spacious & Organized

The bag features a large main compartment with ample room for clothes, shoes, and sports accessories, ensuring everything stays organized. A side zip pocket offers quick access to essentials such as keys, wallet, or phone.

Comfort on the Go

Equipped with padded handles and an adjustable shoulder strap, the King Black guarantees comfort and ease during transport. Its ergonomic design ensures a hassle-free carrying experience, even when fully loaded.

Why Choose the Siux King Black?

  • Premium materials for durability and style

  • Versatile, elegant design for sports or travel

  • Generous capacity to carry all your gear

Elevate your game and travel in style with the Siux The King Black sports bag—the perfect balance of functionality and sophistication.

title: Siux Pro Tour Padel Bag Black
description:
Siux Pro Tour Bag – Spacious and Practical

The Siux Pro Tour Bag is a medium-large padel bag designed for players who want to carry their gear comfortably and safely. It holds 2–3 rackets and features a well-ventilated shoe compartment to keep footwear separate and fresh.

Its large main compartment provides ample space for clothes and accessories, making it a practical and reliable choice for training and matches.

title: NOX ML10 TEAM WHITE GRAY PADDLE HOLDER
description:
This NOX ML10 TEAM WHITE GRAY PADDLE HOLDER it has everything. ML10 range, with a more than correct size so as not to leave anything important out of it. This padel racket bag measures 55 x 32 x 34 centimeters and has a capacity of 55 liters. This is a large capacity.

He NOX ML10 TEAM WHITE GRAY PADDLE HOLDER it is elegant and although it is white, it is very striking so we will have a super striking padel racket bag that will look great on our backs.

Its main compartment is large to store everything other than shovels. On the side we will have two pockets for padel rackets and one of them with a Thermo system. What more could you ask for?

At the bottom, finally we see a pocket for padel shoes, this one ventilated to reduce bad odors and humidity.

title: Bolsa padel Wilson Bela Super Tour Branco
description:
The Wilson Bela Super Tour padel bag in white features two main compartments that hold up to 6 rackets. It includes several extra pockets for other accessories and comes lined with Thermoguard to protect the rackets from extreme temperatures.

It has a dedicated pocket for shoes and another pocket for a tablet or cellphone.

title: Osaka Sports Padel Bag | Magnolia
description:
Combine style and functionality with the Osaka Sports Padel Bag in Magnolia, designed for padel players who want durable, high-performance gear with a fresh, expressive look. Crafted from sturdy woven polyester, this bag offers long-lasting reliability while maintaining a lightweight feel.

The bag features an insulated racket compartment to protect your padel rackets, a ventilated footwear pocket to keep shoes separate and fresh, and external zippers for easy access to a padded pocket for valuables or small essentials.

The Magnolia floral print brings elegance and personality to your sports gear, inspired by the magnolia flower’s beauty, resilience, and grace. Perfect for training, matches, or tournaments, the Osaka Sports Padel Bag in Magnolia delivers premium protection, practical storage, and standout design for padel enthusiasts.

title: Oxdog Ultra Tour Pro Thermo Grande 54L Duffel Bag
description:
The Oxdog Ultra Tour Thermo Padel Bag is designed to meet the needs of the most demanding players, offering a large and well-organized space to comfortably carry everything you need for your padel matches. Featuring a thermal compartment for two rackets, a breathable shoe compartment and two additional side pockets, this duffel bag allows you to keep all your equipment tidy and accessible at all times.

The Oxdog Ultra Tour Thermo Padel Duffel Bag is the ideal choice for padel players looking for a versatile, durable, and well-organized option to transport their gear safely and affordably. With a practical and functional design, this duffel bag accompanies you everywhere, ensuring maximum protection and comfort during your matches.

title: Babolat RH Pro Juan Lebron | Padel Bag
description:
Babolat RH Pro Juan Lebron | Padel Bag 

The Babolat Pad RH Pro Juan Lebron, is a high-performance padel bag designed for serious players who need durability, organization, and style. Inspired by the renowned padel player Juan Lebron, this bag is perfect for those who demand the best in both design and functionality.

Product Features:

  • Design: Stylish, sleek, and durable, with a striking design inspired by Juan Lebron's personal style.
  • Compartments: Multiple compartments provide ample space for all your gear, including two main compartments for rackets, a separate section for shoes, and smaller pockets for accessories.
  • Racket Protection: Equipped with a thermal compartment to protect your rackets from extreme temperatures, keeping them safe and in top condition.
  • Capacity: Can carry up to 6 rackets and all necessary accessories.
  • Comfort: Padded shoulder straps and handles offer comfort and ease when carrying the bag, whether on your back or by hand.
  • Material: Made with high-quality, durable materials that withstand wear and tear.
  • Color: A combination of bold colors and sleek design, reflecting the high-performance nature of the bag.

Specifications:

  • Dimensions: 59 x 30 x 41 cm
  • Weight: 1.4 kg
  • Racket Capacity: Up to 6 rackets
  • Material: 100% polyester
  • Special Features: Thermal racket protection, shoe compartment, multiple accessory pockets

The Babolat Padeltas RH Pro Juan Lebron is the ideal choice for competitive players who want to carry their gear in style while ensuring their equipment stays protected and organized.

title: Babolat RH Pro Silver | Padel Bag
description:
Babolat RH Pro | Padel Bag – Optimize Your Game with Style and Functionality

The Babolat RH Pro Padel Bag is the perfect choice for padel players who value both style and performance. This bag provides ample space for your rackets, clothing, and accessories, designed to keep your equipment safe and organized. Whether you’re heading to a match or preparing for a training session, the RH Pro offers the ideal blend of functionality and comfort.

Key Features:

  • Large Main Compartment: Spacious enough to hold all your padel gear, including extra clothing, towels, and accessories.
  • Padded Racket Compartments: Specially designed to transport your rackets securely and protect them from impacts and scratches.
  • Ventilation: Equipped with ventilated pockets to keep your shoes or damp clothes separate and dry.
  • Durable and Lightweight: Made from high-quality materials that ensure durability while keeping the bag light and easy to carry.
  • Comfortable Carrying Options: Adjustable shoulder straps and a handle for easy carrying, whether you prefer to carry it on your back or by hand.
  • Sleek and Sporty Design: The modern design, featuring the iconic Babolat logo, gives the bag a professional and stylish look.
  • Capacity: 62 liters
  • Dimensions: 63 x 37 x 30 cm

The Babolat RH Pro Padel Bag is the ideal choice for players seeking a versatile, practical bag that keeps their padel equipment safe and organized. Get ready for your next challenge with a bag as strong as your game!

title: Babolat Racketholder Performance Padelbag Colour
description:
Babolat RH performance padel bag gen 2 black

The Babolat RH Performance Padel Bag Gen 2 (Black) is a premium, high-capacity padel bag designed for serious players who demand both functionality and style. With a generous 62-liter volume and space for up to 4 padel rackets, this bag keeps all your gear organized and protected during training and match days.

Crafted from 100% recycled polyester, this bag combines sustainability with smart design. It features 3 main compartments—including one thermal compartment to protect your rackets from extreme temperatures—and two side pockets for smaller accessories. Adjustable shoulder straps and a padded handle ensure carrying comfort wherever you go.

Key specifications of the Babolat RH performance 

  • Racket capacity: up to 4 padel rackets
  • Volume: 62 liters
  • Dimensions: 63 x 37 x 30 cm
  • Number of compartments: 3 main compartments (1 thermal) + 2 side pockets
  • Number of handles: 1
  • Number of straps: 2 adjustable shoulder straps
  • Material: 100% recycled polyester
  • Color: black

Built for performance and protection

This second-generation RH Performance bag is designed for players who carry more gear and want advanced features like thermal insulation and multiple compartments. Whether you're heading to a local match or traveling for a tournament, this bag delivers reliability, organization, and comfort.

Why choose the Babolat RH performance padel bag Gen 2

  • Holds up to 4 padel rackets and all your gear
  • Thermal racket compartment: protects against temperature changes
  • Smart internal layout: space for shoes, clothing, and accessories
  • Eco-friendly materials: made from recycled polyester
  • Comfortable to carry: padded straps and ergonomic design

title: Babolat RH Pro Black/Silver | Padel Bag
description:
Babolat RH Pro Black/Silver | Padel Bag – Sleek, Durable, and Ready for Your Game

The Babolat RH Pro Black/Silver Padel Bag combines functionality, durability, and a sleek design to meet the needs of serious padel players. Crafted with high-quality materials, this bag offers ample space for all your gear while ensuring your rackets and accessories are safely stored. title: Babolat court backpack dark blue
description:
Babolat Court Backpack Hero for Padel (Dark Blue)

The Babolat Court Backpack Hero (Dark Blue) is the ideal backpack for padel players looking for a stylish, practical solution on and off the court. Its deep blue design adds a sporty, modern touch while offering the same smart functionality trusted by players who are always on the move.

With a 30-liter capacity, this backpack easily fits up to 2 padel rackets along with your clothing, shoes, accessories and even a laptop. The thoughtful layout helps keep everything organized, while the 100% recycled polyester material ensures it's both durable and eco-friendly.

Key specifications of the Babolat Court Backpack Hero

  • Racket capacity: Up to 2 padel rackets
  • Volume: 30 liters
  • Dimensions: 50 x 29 x 24 cm

Compartments:

  • 1 racket compartment (fits 2 padel rackets)
  • 2 main compartments
  • 2 side pockets
  • 1 accessory zip pocket
  • 1 padded laptop compartment

Comfort features:

  • 1 sturdy top handle
  • 2 adjustable padded shoulder straps
  • Material: 100% recycled polyester

Made for active padel players

Whether you're heading to the club, work or school, this backpack has the space and structure to carry everything you need. Keep your rackets protected, your clothes separate, and your essentials neatly stored all in one streamlined and stylish design.

Why choose the Babolat Court Backpack Hero (Dark Blue)

  • Fits 2 padel rackets plus gear and personal items
  • Sleek yet spacious — perfect for matches, training, or travel
  • Made from recycled materials: strong, lightweight and sustainable
  • Eye-catching dark blue color with a premium finish
  • Smart internal layout: ideal for athletes with busy routines

title: Babolat Court S Padel Bag
description:
Babolat Court S Padel Bag for practical storage and on-court performance

The Babolat Court S Padel Bag is a functional and stylish racket bag designed for padel players who want to carry all their gear in one compact and efficient solution. With a total capacity of 35 liters and space for up to 4 rackets, this bag is ideal for both training sessions and match days.

Made from 100% recycled materials, the bag features 2 main compartments and smaller zip pockets for valuables like your phone, wallet or keys. Adjustable padded shoulder straps ensure a comfortable fit, whether you're walking to the court or traveling to a tournament.

Key specifications of the Babolat Court S Padel Bag

  • Number of main compartments: 2
  • Racket capacity: up to 4 padel rackets
  • Volume: 35 liters
  • Dimensions: 49 x 30 x 26 cm
  • Straps: 3 adjustable straps
  • Material: 100% recycled polyester
  • Color: black

Made for modern padel players

The Court S Padel Bag is compact, sleek and built for convenience. Whether you’re packing rackets, clothes or accessories, this bag keeps everything organized and protected. It’s perfect for players who prefer a minimalist, efficient carry solution without sacrificing space.

Why choose the Babolat Court S Padel Bag

  • Holds up to 4 padel rackets with gear
  • Two main compartments: for rackets and clothing
  • Made from recycled materials: strong and sustainable
  • Compact size and smart layout: ideal for daily use
  • Comfortable straps: for easy carrying on your back

title: Bullpadel Neuron Black | Padel Bag
description:
Bullpadel Neuron Black Padel Bag

The Bullpadel Neuron Black Padel Bag is a sleek, stylish, and highly functional bag designed to meet the needs of modern padel players. Whether you're heading to the court for a casual match or a serious tournament, this bag provides all the storage and organization you need to carry your gear in style. With a sophisticated design and durable materials, the Neuron Black bag offers top-tier protection for your rackets, shoes, and accessories.

Key Features:

  • Main Compartment:
    The spacious main compartment offers ample room for your padel rackets, clothing, and extra accessories. The interior is designed for easy access and organization, ensuring you can find everything you need in a flash.

  • Racket Compartments:
    Featuring two dedicated racket compartments, the Neuron Black bag is designed to protect your rackets from damage. These compartments are padded to safeguard your rackets from shocks and temperature changes, keeping them in optimal condition.

  • Shoe Compartment:
    A separate ventilated shoe compartment allows you to store your shoes away from your other gear, preventing dirt and odors from mixing with your equipment. The breathable design ensures proper airflow, keeping your shoes fresh.

  • Multiple Pockets:
    In addition to the main compartment, the bag includes several smaller pockets for personal items such as your phone, wallet, keys, and other essentials. These pockets provide added organization and easy access to smaller items.

  • Durable Material:
    Constructed from high-quality, durable materials, the Neuron Black bag is built to withstand the wear and tear of frequent use. It offers excellent resistance to the elements, ensuring your equipment stays protected in any weather condition.

  • Comfortable Carrying Options:
    The bag features comfortable, adjustable shoulder straps for easy carrying, as well as a top handle for quick grab-and-go convenience. The padded straps ensure maximum comfort, even when the bag is fully loaded.

Performance:

The Bullpadel Neuron Black Padel Bag is not just about looks; it’s built for performance and convenience. Its sleek black design is complemented by smart organizational features that keep your gear in top condition and easily accessible. Whether you're a competitive player or a recreational enthusiast, this bag provides the perfect solution to store and carry your padel essentials with ease and style.

description:
Head Base M | Padel Bag – Compact, Practical, and Reliable

The Head Base M Padel Bag is perfect for players seeking a lightweight and functional bag to carry their essentials. With its compact design and practical compartments, this bag ensures your gear stays organized and protected, making it an ideal choice for everyday padel matches or training sessions.

Key Features:

  • Spacious Main Compartment: Offers ample room for your padel racket, clothing, and accessories.
  • Dedicated Racket Compartment: Provides extra protection for your racket during transport.
  • Durable Materials: Crafted from tough, wear-resistant fabrics for long-lasting use.
  • Comfortable Shoulder Straps: Adjustable straps for easy carrying on your back or by hand.
  • Compact Design: Perfectly sized for players who prefer a simple and functional bag without excess bulk.

Capacity and Dimensions:

  • Volume: 30 liters.
  • Dimensions: 57 cm x 33 cm x 28 cm.

The Head Base M Padel Bag offers a great balance of simplicity and functionality, making it the perfect companion for any padel enthusiast. Stay prepared and organized for your next game with this dependable bag!

title: HEAD Retro Padel bag 25th LTD
description:
HEAD Retro Padel Bag 25th LTD

Celebrate 25 years of HEAD Padel with the exclusive HEAD Retro Padel Bag 25th LTD. Inspired by HEAD’s first-ever padel racket, this vintage-style bag comes in brown and black, featuring the original HEAD padel logo and premium PU leather construction. It’s a perfect match with the limited-edition HEAD rackets, like the HEAD Elite Retro 2026.

Designed for players who value both style and performance, this bag offers plenty of space and smart storage. With two outer racket compartments (one with CCT+ climate control technology), a main compartment, a shoe compartment, and multiple accessory pockets, it's ready for anything. The backpack carry system ensures comfort during transport.

Key features of the HEAD Retro Padel Bag 25th LTD

  • Limited edition: created to celebrate 25 years of HEAD Padel
  • Vintage look: brown color inspired by HEAD’s first padel racket
  • Original HEAD Padel logo: adds authentic retro detail
  • Premium PU leather: durable and stylish outer material
  • Matches retro rackets: perfect companion to the HEAD Elite Retro
  • Two racket compartments: one includes CCT+ climate control
  • Main compartment: for clothing and larger gear
  • Shoe compartment: separate and ventilated
  • Accessory pockets: two outer zip pockets and one internal pocket
  • Backpack system: for comfortable carrying
  • Sustainable details: recycled paper tag tied with hemp string

Why choose the HEAD Retro Padel Bag 25th LTD

  • Standout limited-edition design with historic value
  • Functional layout with climate-controlled racket storage
  • Eco-conscious packaging elements
  • Built to last with reinforced construction
  • Combines heritage design with modern performance

title: HEAD Team Padel Bag Large
description:
HEAD Team Padel Bag Large for practical storage and comfort

The HEAD Team Padel Bag Large is a spacious and functional racket bag designed for padel players who want reliable storage with a clean, sporty look. Whether you're heading to a training session or a competition, this bag provides room for all your essentials without compromising on comfort.

Equipped with two main compartments and adjustable shoulder straps, this bag allows you to carry rackets, clothing and accessories with ease. The separate accessory pockets help keep valuables and smaller items organized and secure.

Made of 100% polyester, the bag is lightweight, durable and easy to clean. Its black and silver design gives it a sleek, professional appearance.

Key specifications of the HEAD Team Padel Bag Large

  • Bag type: racket bag
  • Compartments: 2 large compartments for rackets and clothing
  • Accessory pockets: separate space for smaller valuables
  • Straps: 2 adjustable shoulder straps for comfort
  • Material: 100% polyester
  • Dimensions: 61.5 x 31.5 x 31 cm
  • Color: black/silver

Design and usability

The Team Padel Bag Large offers an ideal mix of function and simplicity. Its compact shape and padded straps make it easy to carry, even when fully packed. The large compartments ensure quick access to your gear, while the side pockets keep personal items within reach. 

Why choose the HEAD Team Padel Bag Large

  • Spacious layout: fits rackets, clothes and more
  • Comfortable to carry: thanks to adjustable shoulder straps
  • Extra pockets: for accessories and valuables
  • Durable polyester material: light and long-lasting
  • Stylish design: in sleek black and silver
